: : Rodimus Prime : :
The tail sends Rodimus sailing a bit, and then back to the ground. He gets back to his knees. He jumps at Hydras with his saw blade out, slashing at his enemy.
Rodimus Prime: Give her back to me!
 aerosmith4e@... wrote:Hydras brought up one of his tails and took the kick while the second tail 
slashed at his back like a whip. He sent a coeded message to perceptor, "Don't 
waste time with interogation all that matters is she is converted to a 
predacon..she will be more useful to us that way. It will drive Rodimus 
insane..and that is one advantage we can not let slip by."
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus Prime: Heh, and you know that I can bring a lot more, Hydras.
> Rodimus goes for a roundhouse kick on the Predacon Commander.
>  aerosmith4e@... wrote:Hydras was hit in the right fire wing. Flames shot 
> and and he tumbles to the 
> ground making a small crater. He flipped up and stared Rodimus down, "Enjoying 
> our little rumble Rodimus...you haven't seen anything yet!"
> > 
> > OOC: Ok, here is the repost.
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > Rodimus crashes into the ground from Hydras' throw. Rodimus does a kickup, 
> > returning to his feet. He fires three of his wrist mounted photon lasers at 
> > Hydras' head.
> >  aerosmith4e@... wrote:OOC: Hydras is in the air lol repost :)
> > > 
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > Rodimus was slammed to the ground by Hydras. It didn't keep him out long. 
> > > Rodimus tries to sweep Hydras' legs out.
> > >  aerosmith4e@... wrote:OOC:where is nightlight now?
> > > 
> > > Hydras sot upwards when hesaw rodimus flip missing Carnatron's shots. he 
> > > grabbes rodimus's foot and threw him towards the ground.
> > > > 
> > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > As Hydras launches his shoulder blasters, Rodimus jumps up performing a 
> > front 
> > > > flip. Hydras' shots strike the ground below. Carnations's shots also pass 
> by 
> > > > heading for Hydras' body. As Rodimus completes the flip, he extends his 
> > body, 
> > > > his feet about to come down on Hydras' head.
> > > >  aerosmith4e@... wrote:Hydras takes the kick to the stomach and 
> caused 
> > > him 
> > > > to stumble back a few 
> > > > feet. . He sent a roar and fired his shoulder cannons at Rodimus.
> > > > Carnatron while Rodimus was distracted transformed into Prime and fired 
> the 
> > > > big gun twice at his back.
> > > > > 
> > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > Rodimus tries to jump off of Carnation. The spikes cause some damage to 
> > his 
> > > > arms 
> > > > > and legs.
> > > > > Hydras blade strikes his spoiler, slowing the swing long enough for 
> > Rodimus 
> > > to 
> > > > > send a thrust kick his way.
> > > > >  Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:As Aerotaur dropped straight in 
> his 
> > > > line 
> > > > > of fire, Owlhawk expression
> > > > > soured faster than it had ever taken for Starscream to scheme
> > > > > something up.
> > > > > 
> > > > > As his ally dropped to the ground, he decided to take things personal.
> > > > > He pushed himself forward and hurled himself at the spy with the speed
> > > > > and force of a meteor, ready to throw a punch.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Owlhawk: Windlord! Try to stabilize him enough for me to attend him!
> > > > > That was no ordinary weapon!
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > Windlord:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "AEROTAUR!!!!!!!!!" shouted anguised when he saw his friend collapse, 
> > > > > > he ran towards him in order to help him.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > > > > > > OOC: Sorry about the other one... dumbass AOL
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > ::Aerotaur::
> > > > > > >        He sees Flicker flipping over him and before Flicker lands 
> > > > > > he executes 
> > > > > > > a quick backflip over Flicker.  He lands behind him and raises his 
> > > > > > arm a 
> > > > > > > small blaster popping out of the back of it.  "Don't I though?"
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > >        Unfortunately this flip put him directly in the line of fire 
> > > > > > from 
> > > > > > > Owlhawk.  The series of blasts catch him square in the back and he 
> > > > > > winces 
> > > > > > > lowering his arm.  He finally collapses to his knees and falls 
> > > > > > forward onto 
> > > > > > > Nightlight and, possibly, Flicker's legs.
> > > > >
